events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I want to return it and get a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I purchased.
The case has been reviewed and categorized under Refund due to customer's request for a money back related to an incorrect order received.
A customer support agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request regarding the wrong item delivered.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you received the wrong item and would like to process a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and start the refund process?
Here is my order number 12345 and attached is the photo of the item I got instead of the one I ordered. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the details. We will arrange a return pickup for the incorrect item and process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
That sounds good to me. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund being processed quickly. Thank you!
The refund process has been initiated and the return shipment scheduled. Please keep an eye on your email for the pickup confirmation and refund update.
We are following up to confirm that your refund was successfully completed. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund issue is resolved, we are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and for contacting us.
